verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu tāṅre dhairya karāila
nitya āsi' āmāya miliha-ei ājñā dila

synonyms: tabe—at that time; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—the boy; dhairya—patient; karāila—caused to be; nitya—daily; āsi'—coming; āmāya—Me; miliha—meet; ei ājñā—this order; dila—gave.
translation: At that time, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu calmed the youth and ordered him to come there daily to meet Him.
